meanings.definition: Of or relating to the immune response of an organism against its own cells or tissues.
meanings.sent1: The autoimmune reaction caused harm to the body's own cells.
meanings.sent2: Her autoimmune condition made her body attack itself.
meanings.sent3: The immune system's autoimmune mix-up was like a confused army attacking its own soldiers.
meanings.sent4: The autoimmune response was a double-edged sword, protecting and harming simultaneously.
meanings.sent5: The autoimmune defense turned against the body, like a loyal guard suddenly becoming a traitor.

meanings.definition: A disease resulting from an autoimmune response.
meanings.sent1: He was diagnosed with an autoimmune that affected his organs.
meanings.sent2: Autoimmune can lead to various health issues.
meanings.sent3: The autoimmune disease played a sneaky trick on the body's defense system.
meanings.sent4: Living with autoimmune felt like having a rebellious immune system.
meanings.sent5: The doctor explained how autoimmune could turn the body into its own enemy.
